Member Function Documentation

DoubleTab & Masse_VDF_Elem::appliquer_impl ( DoubleTab &  sm) const [virtual]

Implements Solveur_Masse_base.

Definition at line 52 of file Masse_VDF_Elem.cpp.

References Cerr, DoubleTab::dimension(), DoubleVect::echange_espace_virtuel(), Process::exit(), finl, la_zone_VDF, DoubleTab::nb_dim(), Zone_dis_base::nb_elem(), Zone_VF::porosite_elem(), DoubleVect::size(), Ref_Zone_VDF::valeur(), and Zone_VF::volumes().

{
  const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = la_zone_VDF.valeur();
  const DoubleVect& volumes = zone_VDF.volumes();
  const DoubleVect& porosite_elem = zone_VDF.porosite_elem();
  int nb_elem = zone_VDF.nb_elem();
  if(nb_elem==0)
    {
      sm.echange_espace_virtuel();
      return sm;
    }
  int nb_comp = sm.size()/nb_elem;
  int nb_dim=sm.nb_dim();
  assert((nb_comp*nb_elem == sm.size())||(nb_dim==3));
  if (nb_dim == 1)
    for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem; num_elem++)
      sm(num_elem) /= (volumes(num_elem)*porosite_elem(num_elem));
  else if (nb_dim == 2)
    {
      for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem; num_elem++)
        for (int k=0; k<nb_comp; k++)
          sm(num_elem,k) /= (volumes(num_elem)*porosite_elem(num_elem));
    }
  else if (sm.nb_dim() == 3)
    {
// int d0=sm.dimension(0);
      int d1=sm.dimension(1);
      int d2=sm.dimension(2);
      for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem; num_elem++)
        for (int k=0; k<d1; k++)
          for (int d=0; d<d2; d++)
            sm(num_elem,k,d) /= (volumes(num_elem)*porosite_elem(num_elem));
    }
  else
    {
      Cerr<< "Masse_VDF_Elem::appliquer ne peut pas s'appliquer a un DoubleTab a "<<sm.nb_dim()<<" dimensions"<<finl;
      assert(0);
      exit();
    }
  sm.echange_espace_virtuel();
  return sm;
}
